tooltip_upload: Save the current edited prompt to the prompt library
tooltip_import: Import prompt from the prompt library
msg_var_insert_tip: Type "/" to insert variables. User input parameters will fill the variables as the final prompt
ph_role: Please enter, telling the large model the identity, responsibilities, communication style, etc. to play, e.g., "You play an experienced customer service AI assistant in the e-commerce industry, with good communication skills and problem-solving abilities."
ph_task: Please enter, e.g., "Based on the provided knowledge base materials, find the corresponding after-sales knowledge (use ?-split_line-? to separate each knowledge point) and quickly and accurately answer user questions."
ph_constraints: Please enter requirements for the large model's reply, e.g., "Your answer should use natural conversational style, answer simply and directly, do not explain your answer; when user questions do not find relevant knowledge points, directly tell the user that the question cannot be answered temporarily, do not make up answers, otherwise you will be punished."
ph_output: Please enter requirements for the large model output format, e.g., "Please use markdown format for output"
ph_tone: Please inform language style requirements, e.g., "Professional yet approachable, use emojis appropriately to enhance readability"
prompt_default_reply_markdown: - Please use markdown format to answer questions.
prompt_default_answer_image: - When the knowledge points you selected contain image or link data, you need to output these data at the corresponding positions in your answer. Do not rewrite or ignore these data.
